name: Star Monja
overview: "When God made MONJA for us. This little MONJA said, I'll take what I can. 'Cause a MAN he doesn't understand. MONJA is my friend. This MONJA is my friend." Star Monja is a breeding simulation game that takes place in the year 2030 in which the player can rise a creature called Monja from an egg that can evolve depending of the player choices, items and food to different Monjas creatures (there are more than 100 different ones). After his creatures are evolved he can train them to go to battle other creatures in tournaments. The game also features trading the player creatures from others using the memory card, or battle using his creatures instead or playing the story mode.
